text: In total, 51 patients were enrolled, and 49 patients (group L; 17, group M; 16, group H; 16) completed the study. One patient was excluded because of an excess of two cranial pinning attempts, and the other patient was removed from the study because of loss of patient data. Demographic data indicated no differences among the three groups (Table 1) .
sentences: In total, 51 patients were enrolled, and 49 patients (group L; 17, group M; 16, group H; 16) completed the study.
One patient was excluded because of an excess of two cranial pinning attempts, and the other patient was removed from the study because of loss of patient data.
Demographic data indicated no differences among the three groups (Table 1) .
